title: BugSplat HELP
body: Rito please! What the hell man! I cant play a single game! Bugsplat allllllll day.. I reconnect bug splat after bug splat after bug splat! why? fix that holy shit... lost my first 4 ranked because of servers issues and now bug splat. God damn. Im mad!

replies.body: It sounds like something is failing to render the game, which is usually what results in a bugsplat.  It could be drivers or something else entirely, so I recommend using the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to rule out possibilities.  Let me know if you have any questions!
